lead_paragraph: MCKEAND--Carol Evan, died peacefully on the morning of December 19th, 2015 after a 10 year battle with Alzheimer's. An extremely talented author, television writer and producer (two Emmy nominations and the winner of four of the prestigious Humanitas awards). A true New Yorker, she will be remembered for her engaging, irreverent wit and the loyalty and kindness of a true friend. Dearest Carol... you are deeply missed by your husband Nigel, your daughter Sarah (a.k.a Bishi), your son-in-law Ryan, and your two amazing grandchildren, Olivia, 11 and Griffin, 8. You touched everyone who knew you. A memorial will be held for Carol on January 23rd, 2016 in Beverly Hills. For information, please email carolevan1930@gmail.com. We have loved you through every "Glad and Sorry Season". 1/3
